chunks.zh: 农村亲戚炫耀二本儿子在福建当程序员月薪一万二，应该如何应对？
chunks.en: How should I respond to rural relatives bragging that their second-tier college son earns 12,000 yuan a month as a programmer in Fujian?

chunks.zh: 最近过年返乡遇到一件让我有些尴尬的事情。
chunks.en: Recently, during the Spring Festival return home, I encountered something that made me a little embarrassed.

chunks.zh: 在一次酒席上，同桌而坐的亲戚一直说自己儿子有多厉害，还不停地夸耀月薪一万二，说的他儿子好有出息。
chunks.en: At a banquet, a relative sitting at the same table kept talking about how great his son was, constantly bragging about his monthly salary of 12,000 yuan, saying his son was very promising.

chunks.zh: 其实我也知道我不如他儿子优秀，但是作为专科生的我还是感觉有点尴尬。
chunks.en: Actually, I also know that I am not as good as his son, but as a junior college student, I still feel a little embarrassed.

chunks.zh: 而且亲戚这样炫耀，让我感觉好像我们其他人的孩子都不如他家的一样。
chunks.en: Moreover, the relative's boasting made me feel as if our other children were not as good as his.

chunks.zh: 虽然心里有些不满，但我也知道不能直接和亲戚翻脸。
chunks.en: Although I was a little dissatisfied, I also knew that I couldn't directly fall out with the relative.

chunks.zh: 那么应该如何应对这种情况呢？
chunks.en: So how should I deal with this situation?

chunks.zh: 不理解。
chunks.en: I don't understand.

chunks.zh: 又不是在阴阳怪气你，也没有拐弯骂你，只是单纯炫耀一下自己的孩子，因为 你自己 感觉不舒服就要想办法怼回去。
chunks.en: It's not like they're being sarcastic or subtly scolding you, just simply showing off their child. Because *you* feel uncomfortable, you want to find a way to retort.

chunks.zh: 说明你敏感且自卑，有这功夫不如想想怎么多赚点钱。
chunks.en: It shows that you are sensitive and have low self-esteem. Instead of doing this, you should think about how to make more money.

chunks.zh: 直接在饭桌上问自己快要结婚了能不能找他儿子借点钱（🐶
chunks.en: Directly ask at the dinner table whether you can borrow some money from his son as you are getting married soon (🐶

chunks.zh: 既然是亲戚，人家吹牛你就顺着称赞两句就好ps：无论工资高低，别人问你都说一万左右，比较符合农村的心理预期
chunks.en: Since they are relatives, just go along with their boasting and praise them a bit. PS: Regardless of the actual salary, always say around 10,000 when others ask, which is more in line with rural expectations.

chunks.zh: 其实有没有可能是自己的自尊心作祟，可能领居也并不完全是炫耀，辛辛苦苦养大的儿子能有出息赚到钱，他把这份喜悦分享给身边的亲戚朋友，可能本身并没有恶意，只是可能农村的父母没有接受太多的教育，不会很懂这样的话语会给别人造成什么影响。
chunks.en: Actually, is it possible that it's your own self-esteem acting up? Maybe the neighbor isn't entirely boasting. Their son, whom they raised with great effort, is successful and earns money, and they share this joy with relatives and friends around them. Perhaps there is no malice in itself, but perhaps rural parents have not received much education and don't understand what impact these words will have on others.

chunks.zh: 一千个人心中有一千个哈姆雷特，不同的心态看待事物就会得到不同的结果，你开心的时候觉得花草树木都是欢快娱乐，你悲伤难过的时候看什么都会 emo 。
chunks.en: A thousand people have a thousand Hamlets in their hearts. Different mindsets will lead to different results. When you are happy, you feel that flowers, trees, and plants are cheerful and entertaining. When you are sad, everything looks emo.

chunks.zh: 你也太玻璃心了吧，他儿子有份高薪工作，他高兴很正常啊，你该祝贺祝贺他
chunks.en: You are too sensitive, aren't you? It's normal for him to be happy that his son has a high-paying job. You should congratulate him.

chunks.zh: 这种人你就顺着他的话，夸他就行了，保证他开心的不行。
chunks.en: For this kind of person, just go along with what he says and praise him, and he will be very happy.

chunks.zh: 问到你，你就说赚不到什么钱，勉勉强强。
chunks.en: When asked about you, just say you don't earn much money, just barely making ends meet.

chunks.zh: 把内容抛给他。
chunks.en: Throw the topic back to him.

chunks.zh: 其实为什么很多人能做好交际，就是这样做的，会聊天，有时候夸一下别人真的很简单，效果也是真的好
chunks.en: Actually, the reason why many people can do well in social situations is because they do this: they can chat, and sometimes praising others is really simple, and the effect is really good.

chunks.zh: 我以为你月薪是人家几倍，因为怕说出来伤人家自尊太尴尬而不好应对，结果。。。
chunks.en: I thought your monthly salary was several times higher than his, and you were afraid that saying it would hurt his self-esteem and be too embarrassing to deal with, but...

chunks.zh: 他儿子大概率也挺烦 他这样炫耀的吧
chunks.en: His son is probably also annoyed by his bragging, right?

chunks.zh: 看淡就好，有个亲戚孩子进了华为，那真是风光无限。
chunks.en: Just take it lightly. A relative's child entered Huawei, and it was really glorious.

chunks.zh: 下次再听到就是干了 2 个月被开除了，沦为了笑谈。
chunks.en: The next time I heard about it, he was fired after working for 2 months and became a laughing stock.

chunks.zh: 上面说什么借钱，是馊主意，农村人不是傻子，精得很，很狡猾，你一开口人家就知道你的心理了，而且是在座的全部人都能看清，本来还没注意到你呢，你说什么借钱，引火烧身，一人一句就把你淹了。
chunks.en: The suggestion above about borrowing money is a bad idea. Rural people are not stupid, they are very shrewd and cunning. As soon as you open your mouth, they will know your intentions, and everyone present will be able to see it. They may not have even noticed you, but if you talk about borrowing money, you will be in trouble. Everyone will say something and drown you.

chunks.zh: 直接翻脸掀桌走人，第二天吊死在他家门口。
chunks.en: Immediately flip out, overturn the table and leave, and hang yourself at his door the next day.

chunks.zh: 使劲夸他儿子，同时努力提升自己
chunks.en: Praise his son vigorously while working hard to improve yourself.

chunks.zh: 我建议成年人如果不愿意参与互吹就别参加这种酒席，但如果真想在这种酒席吵架我推荐几个更有劲的话题：中医、卡脖、转基因
chunks.en: I suggest that adults who don't want to participate in mutual boasting should not attend this kind of banquet, but if you really want to argue at this kind of banquet, I recommend a few more powerful topics: traditional Chinese medicine, bottleneck, genetically modified.

chunks.zh: 保持微笑，不要主动参与话题，如果被点名，就打太极说些没用的话。
chunks.en: Keep smiling, don't actively participate in the topic, and if you are called upon, play Tai Chi and say some useless things.

chunks.zh: 普通人不是小说主角，处于劣势就忍耐，你回头努力可以，当场反杀就没必要了（除非你有实力）。
chunks.en: Ordinary people are not the protagonists of novels. If you are at a disadvantage, be patient. You can work hard later, but there is no need to fight back on the spot (unless you have the strength).

chunks.zh: 记住，一定记住，不管真穷还是假穷，一定一定要装穷
chunks.en: Remember, remember, whether you are really poor or pretending to be poor, you must pretend to be poor.

chunks.zh: ？？又没 cue 你，这么敏感干嘛
chunks.en: ?? No one cued you, why are you so sensitive?

chunks.zh: 装穷
chunks.en: Pretend to be poor

chunks.zh: 想到昨天亲戚问的一句话，他问：你那工作是不是 33 岁就不让干了？到了 33 岁就得被辞退。
chunks.en: I thought of a sentence a relative asked yesterday. He asked: Is it true that you can't do your job after 33? Do you have to be fired when you reach 33?

chunks.zh: 点进来以前我以为是他爸误以为儿子这工资在福建很厉害，你比他儿子强得多又不想驳他面子……
chunks.en: Before clicking in, I thought it was his father who mistakenly thought that his son's salary was very high in Fujian, and you were much better than his son and didn't want to embarrass him...
